🔍 Login UI Kit Description


The best and newest Figma features included!


In this package you can find 10 login process styles following one design system. Most of the elements have assigned a master component, which make it easier to match or adjust design style for your own product.


Easy to customize and to take in hand, it will help you in your projects! Use these pixel-perfect UI elements to design your next web design project efficiently.


The Design System has been equipped with typography, iconography, color styles, components, elements, buttons, input forms and many others.


In addition, the design in Figma has been designed with fully in auto layout, so it is very adaptive if you want to edit, delete, or add some parts. If you are not familiar with auto layout, you can turn it off by right-clicking the layer, and selecting remove auto layout.



💣 UnitFlows 10 Login Styles UI Kit is suitable for:

- Digital Finance App

- Mobile Banking App

- E-Wallet App

- Money Management App

- Financial Technology App

- Payment App

...and much more as universal design makes it easy to adapt login flows to many applications.
